properties.entry: Incorrect number of arguments to type expression. Type expression {0} takes {1} argument(s), but {2} were provided.
Types within a protocol are not allowed to have parameters. Type {0} takes {1} argument(s).
The first version in a protocol cannot have types removed.
The resulting protocol version is empty.
The type {0} is not present in the current protocol version.
The type {0} is already present in the current protocol version.
